test.create_query: CREATE TABLE aggregation_lowcardinality_keys (low_card_str_key String, low_card_int_key UInt32, high_card_int_key UInt32) ENGINE = Memory
test.fill_query: INSERT INTO aggregation_lowcardinality_keys SELECT cast( number % 3 as String) AS low_card_str_key, number % 4 AS low_card_int_key, number % 1000000 AS high_card_int_key FROM numbers(200000000)
test.query: SELECT low_card_str_key, low_card_int_key, count(1) FROM aggregation_lowcardinality_keys GROUP BY low_card_str_key, low_card_int_key Format Null
SELECT low_card_int_key, high_card_int_key, count(1) FROM aggregation_lowcardinality_keys GROUP BY low_card_int_key, high_card_int_key Format Null
